metadata.title: CVE-2019-13038 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: mod_auth_mellon through 0.14.2 has an Open Redirect via the login?ReturnTo= substring, as demonstrated by omitting the // after http: in the target URL.

notes.note: mdeslaur> original bug has been closed as the original project has been abandoned. new code repo maintained by RedHat available here: https://github.com/latchset/mod_auth_mellon/

criterions.comment: libapache2-mod-auth-mellon package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.14.2-1ubuntu2').
